During the Archon Quest [[State of the Holy Lyre der Himmel]], the [[Holy Lyre der Himmel]] is partially repaired by using a [[Clear Dvalin Tear]]. Then it is [[Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel|completely repaired]] during [[Crystal Tears]].
